PlayerGravityManager
MonoBehaviour
public
PlayerGravityManager

Manages the gravity interaction of the player.

Private Variables
Parameters
_standardGravityMultiplier

Gravity multiplier for the normal situations.

_fallingGravityMultiplier

The multiplier for the gravity when the player is falling.

Essential Components
_rigidBody

The RigidBody of the player.

Unity Methods
Awake
private void Awake()

Calls the Setup Methods.

Update
private void Update()

Calls the Gravity Logic methods that need to be called every frame.

OnDestroy
private void OnDestroy()

Handles the class right before the destruction of the GameObject, by calling the Destruction Methods

Setup Methods
GetEssentialComponents
private void GetEssentialComponents()

Retrives the Essential Components from the player.

SubscribeFunctions
private void SubscribeFunctions()

Subscribe the Listeners Methods to their respective signals

Destruction Methods
UnsubscribeFunctins
private void UnsubscribeFunctins()

Remove the subscription of the Listeners, subscribed at SubscribeFunctions.

Gravity Logic
GravityDecision.
private void GravityDecision(
bool isGrounded
)

Decides witch gravity value to apply every frame.

Parameters
isGrounded
bool

Boolean that recieves the info if the player is grounded or not.

ResetGravity
private void ResetGravity()

Resets the gravity to the standard value.

FallingGravity
private void FallingGravity()

Sets the gravity to the falling value.

Listeners

Listens to certein function callings

OnJumpListener
private void OnJumpListener(
bool isJump
)
